mapper.sql: p.id, p.name, p.pid, p.zindex, p.istype, p.descpt, p.code, p.icon, p.page, p.sys_id sysId, p.domain_id domainId, p.create_date createDate, p.modify_date modifyDate, s.`name` sysName, d.`name` domainName, d.domain_path domainPath
mapper.select:
select
from dj_user_permission p INNER JOIN dj_user_sys s on p.sys_id=s.id INNER JOIN dj_user_domain d on p.domain_id=d.id ORDER BY p.zindex

select
from dj_user_permission p INNER JOIN dj_user_sys s on p.sys_id=s.id INNER JOIN dj_user_domain d on p.domain_id=d.id where p.pid=#{pid}
mapper.sql: p.id, p.name,p.pid pId, p.zindex, p.istype, p.code, p.icon, p.page
mapper.select:
select
from dj_user_permission p LEFT JOIN dj_user_role_permission rp ON rp.permit_id=p.id WHERE rp.role_id=#{roleId}

select p.id, p.name,p.pid pId, p.zindex, p.istype, p.code, p.icon, p.page from dj_user_permission p LEFT JOIN dj_user_role_permission rp ON rp.permit_id=p.id LEFT JOIN dj_user_role r ON r.id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN dj_system_job_role ur ON ur.role_id=r.id WHERE ur.job_id=#{userId} AND p.sys_id=#{source} GROUP BY p.id order by p.zindex
